column4: The version of amsn that i get when typing sudo apt-get install amsn is out of date, is there a way to update it?
it's not out of date -- it's the version that's trusted to work with the current Ubuntu release. Is there anything in particular that you need from the new version?
well it says that there is a new version available, and then when i try to sign on, everything is just blank so i figured it was because of my outdated version
check if there is a new version in backports
